Name: Armory
Description:
Provide advanced upgrade licenses for Goliath and Siege Tank in Advanced Tech Lab. Provide weapons and armor upgrade solutions for all units.

Allow:
- Manufacture Siege Tank in Factory.

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the damage dealt by ground vehicles.
Root.Name: Upgrade Vehicle Weapons Level 1

Root.Name: Upgrade Vehicle Weapons Level 2

Root.Name: Upgrade Vehicle Weapons Level 3

Root.Tooltip: Vulture's movement speed has been increased to 4.8, and when destroyed, it will quickly pounce on nearby units and detonate itself, dealing 45 area damage.
Root.Name: Fenrir Explosive unit

Root.Tooltip: Goliath's maximum health increases by 40. (This is not milk tea)
Root.Name: Assam Titan Armament
